title: PXRGimbal
description: Introducing a specialized plugin for Unreal Engine that simulates the mechanics of a Gimbal. Our tool is designed to offer cinematic-quality stabilization within the virtual environment.  Perfect for machinima filmmakers, game developers.
longDescription:
Introducing a specialized plugin for Unreal Engine that meticulously replicates the behavior of a real-world Gimbal. Designed for those who seek the pinnacle of in-game or in-app cinematic quality, our tool provides seamless stabilization within the virtual realm, even during dynamic scenes and rapid motions.


Key Features:

  • Stabilization: Achieve stabilization across all three rotational axes, ensuring that your visuals remain steady no matter the scenario.
  • Customizable Offsets: Have granular control over the rotation offsets for any stabilized axis, allowing for more tailored cinematic experiences.
  • For Tracking: Our PXRGimbal plugin excels when paired with position and orientation trackers, especially with systems like PXRViveTracking. This synergy ensures top-tier camera motion and orientation accuracy.
  • Automatic Targeting with Stabilization: Activate the auto-targeting feature to have the camera shake or focus on a specific target, while still benefiting from simultaneous rotation stabilization. This is perfect for dynamic sequences or highlighting specific points of interest.
  • User-Friendly: Whether you're a machinima filmmaker, game developer, or crafting other interactive UE experiences, integration and configuration in your project are made easy.


Harness the power of professional film equipment's stability within the UE environment. Our PXRGimbal plugin guarantees that each frame you capture will resonate with your audience, no matter the complexity of the motion or scene.
